producers.name: Shovel
producers.description: Now we're talking! Go out, get your hands dirty, and touch some grass me lads!

producers.name: Gardener
producers.description: Full time, recreational tree planters. Your very own grandma might be a member of this speedy tree-planting coalition...

producers.name: Tree Farm
producers.description: Plant, harvest, and re-plant trees at George Ford assembly line speeds. Not sure why you'd unearth and replant a tree, but you do you.

producers.name: Tree Mine
producers.description: Mine trees from the depths of the earth. Don't ask me how it works, probably some mad science.

producers.name: Seed Bank
producers.description: Get new trees from tree-seed loan interest... Interesting...

producers.name: Arboretum
producers.description: Trees trees and more trees. Get money for more trees from the fare visitors pay to visit your trees.

producers.name: Tree-free Products
producers.description: No trees, no problem (might seem counter intuitive if you think about it in the wrong way, but trust the devs on this)

producers.name: World Tree Organization
producers.description: It's like the WHO but for trees... Them trees lookin' healthy!

producers.name: Kudos' Javascript Console
producers.description: Materialize trees straight from the nerd's very own console

producers.name: Tree Fundraiser
producers.description: #teamtrees... It has finally come full circle...
